mapper.select: WITH CTE_Luong AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN tong_luong < 10000000 THEN '<10' WHEN tong_luong BETWEEN 10000000 AND 20000000 THEN '10-20' WHEN tong_luong BETWEEN 20000000 AND 30000000 THEN '20-30' ELSE '>30' END AS muc_luong, ma_nhan_vien FROM bang_luong ), MucLuong AS ( SELECT '<10' AS muc_luong UNION ALL SELECT '10-20' UNION ALL SELECT '20-30' UNION ALL SELECT '>30' ) SELECT ML.muc_luong, COALESCE(COUNT(CL.ma_nhan_vien), 0) AS so_nhan_vien FROM MucLuong ML LEFT JOIN CTE_Luong CL ON ML.muc_luong = CL.muc_luong GROUP BY ML.muc_luong ORDER BY CASE WHEN ML.muc_luong = '<10' THEN 1 WHEN ML.muc_luong = '10-20' THEN 2 WHEN ML.muc_luong = '20-30' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END

SELECT to_char(make_date(nam, thang, 1), 'YYYY-MM') AS thang_nam, SUM(tong_luong_thuc_nhan) AS tong_luong_thuc_nhan FROM bang_luong WHERE ma_nhan_vien = #{maNhanVien} GROUP BY nam, thang ORDER BY nam, thang
